content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Storage chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 301 coal

### Iron Ore Mining System at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Storage chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 313 iron ore

### Iron Smelting Line at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)

### Copper Processing System at (22, 20)
Consists of:
- Copper ore mining:
  - Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0)
  - Output chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 359 copper ore
- Smelting setup:
  - Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
  - Input chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 377 copper ore
  - Input inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving ore from chest to furnace
  - Output inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving plates to storage
  - Output storage chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with furnace fuel management
- Check furnace fuel capacity before attempting to insert more coal
- When furnace shows "furnace fuel source is full" (50/50 items), do not attempt to add more fuel

### Inefficient material flow setup
- Ensure inserters are properly positioned and oriented to effectively move materials between containers
- Verify the complete production chain is working by checking:
  - Input material availability
  - Fuel levels in all machines
  - Inserter pickup and drop positions
  - Machine working status

### Entity status monitoring
- Monitor entity status messages like "NO_INGREDIENTS", "NO_FUEL", "WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS" to identify and fix production line issues
- Keep burner mining drills fueled to prevent "out of fuel" warnings
